bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: English mining company in the Silverbell Mining District, Pima County, Ariz. John Francis was manager of the company.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 3 series. Materials are in chronological arrangement.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, business records, legal papers, and related material pertaining to company operations, together with the records of its predecessor, the Cañada del Oro Mines. Includes payroll records, 1898-1899; daybook and ledgers, 1891-1900, inventories, assay reports, and other materials.
